fighting

Class Motion

  • java.lang.Object
    • fighting.Motion

  • public class Motion
extends java.lang.Object
    キャラクターが使用できる全モーションのパラメータ及び，それに対応する画像を管理するクラス．

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Motion(MotionData motionData)
      指定されたデータでMotionのインスタンスを作成するクラスコンストラクタ.
      シミュレータ内でのみ呼び出される.
      Motion(java.lang.String[] data, java.lang.String characterName, int playerIndex)
      指定されたデータでMotionクラスのインスタンスを生成するクラスコンストラクタ．

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getActionName()
      Returns the name of this motion.
      int getAttackActive()
      Returns the number of active frames.
      int getAttackGiveEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackGiveGuardRecov()
      Returns the number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackGuardAddEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent.
      int getAttackGuardDamage()
      Returns the value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackHitAddEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent.
      HitArea getAttackHitArea()
      Returns the hit area associated to this motion.
      int getAttackHitDamage()
      Returns the value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackImpactX()
      Returns the change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackImpactY()
      Returns the change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackSpeedX()
      Returns the horizontal speed of the attack hit box.
      int getAttackSpeedY()
      Returns the vertical speed of the attack hit box.
      int getAttackStartAddEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion.
      int getAttackStartUp()
      Returns the number of startup frames required for this motion to become active
      int getAttackType()
      Returns the value of the attack type:
      1 = high,
      2 = middle,
      3 = low,
      4 = throw,
      int getCancelAbleFrame()
      Returns the first frame in which this motion can be canceled.
      int getCancelAbleMotionLevel()
      Returns the maximum motionLevel a motion can have in order to be able to cancel this motion.
      HitArea getCharacterHitArea()
      Returns the hit area associated to this character.
      int getFrameNumber()
      Returns the number of frames in this motion.
      Image getImage(int nowFrame)
      Returns the current image of the character.
      int getMotionLevel()
      Returns the level of this motion.
      Notice that this motion can cancel other motions (after their cancelAbleFrame) if such motions have a cancelAbleMotionLevel higher than the level of this motion.
      int getSpeedX()
      Returns the horizontal speed applied to a character using this motion.
      int getSpeedY()
      Returns the vertical speed applied to a character using this motion.
      State getState()
      Returns the state that is assigned to a character after this motion is completed.
      boolean isAttackDownProp()
      Returns the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when hit.
      boolean isControl()
      Returns the controllable state associated to this motion.
      boolean isLandingFlag()
      Returns true if the Landing motion can cancel this motion, false otherwise.

      Sets the number of active frames.

      Sets the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      Sets the value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      Sets the change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      Sets the cancelAbleMotionLevel setting.

      Sets the character hit area of this motion.
      void setControl(boolean control)
      Sets the control flag.

      Set the number of frames in this motion.
      void setLandingFlag(boolean landingFlag)
      Sets the landingFlag setting, a flag encoding whether the Landing motion can cancel this motion.

      Sets the motionLevel of this motion.

      Sets the name of this motion.

      Sets the speedX setting, which stores the horizontal speed applied to a character using this motion.
      void setSpeedY(int speedY)
      Sets the speedY setting, which stores the vertical speed applied to a character using this motion.
      void setState(State state)
      Sets the state setting, which represents the state assigned to the character at the end of this motion.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Motion

        public Motion(java.lang.String[] data,
              java.lang.String characterName,
              int playerIndex)
        指定されたデータでMotionクラスのインスタンスを生成するクラスコンストラクタ．
        Parameters:
        data - Motion.csvから読み込んだキャラクターのパラメータ
        characterName - キャラクターの名前
        playerIndex - プレイヤー番号(0:P1 1:P2)

      • Motion

        public Motion(MotionData motionData)
        指定されたデータでMotionのインスタンスを作成するクラスコンストラクタ.
        シミュレータ内でのみ呼び出される.
        Parameters:
        motionData - モーションデータ
        See Also:
        MotionData

      • isControl

        public boolean isControl()
        Returns the controllable state associated to this motion. If the flag is false, a character using this motion cannot be controlled until this motion finishes.
        Returns:
        true if a character using this motion is controllable, false otherwise

      • getAttackStartAddEnergy

        Returns:
        the value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion

      • getCancelAbleFrame

        public int getCancelAbleFrame()
        Returns the first frame in which this motion can be canceled. Notice that only a motion whose motionLevel is lower than the cancelAbleMotionLevel of this one can cancel this motion.
        Returns:
        the first frame in which this motion can be canceled

      • getMotionLevel

        public int getMotionLevel()
        Returns the level of this motion.
        Notice that this motion can cancel other motions (after their cancelAbleFrame) if such motions have a cancelAbleMotionLevel higher than the level of this motion.
        Returns:
        the level of this motion

      • isLandingFlag

        public boolean isLandingFlag()
        Returns true if the Landing motion can cancel this motion, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the boolean value that expresses whether or not character lands in this motion.

        Returns the current image of the character.

        Returns:

      • setControl

        public void setControl(boolean control)
        Sets the control flag. If the flag is false, a character using this motion cannot be controlled until this motion finishes.
        Parameters:
        control - the boolean value to give to the flag

      • setAttackDownProp

        public void setAttackDownProp(boolean attackDownProp)
        Sets the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        Parameters:
        attackDownProp - the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • setCancelAbleFrame

        public void setCancelAbleFrame(int cancelAbleFrame)
        Sets the cancelAbleFrame setting. This indicates the first frame when this motion can be cancelled.
        Parameters:
        cancelAbleFrame - the value to assign to the cancelAbleFrame setting

      • setCancelAbleMotionLevel

        public void setCancelAbleMotionLevel(int cancelAbleMotionLevel)
        Sets the cancelAbleMotionLevel setting. This indicates the maximum level that a motion can have to be able to cancel this motion. During cancelable frames, a motion whose level is below this value can cancel the current motion.
        Parameters:
        cancelAbleMotionLevel - the value to assign to the cancelAbleMotionLevel setting

      • setMotionLevel

        public void setMotionLevel(int motionLevel)
        Sets the motionLevel of this motion.
        Parameters:
        motionLevel - the value to assign to the motionLevel setting

      • setState

        public void setState(State state)
        Sets the state setting, which represents the state assigned to the character at the end of this motion.
        Parameters:
        state - the value to assign to the state setting

      • setLandingFlag

        public void setLandingFlag(boolean landingFlag)
        Sets the landingFlag setting, a flag encoding whether the Landing motion can cancel this motion.
        Parameters:
        landingFlag - the value to assign to the landingFlag setting
